channel.title: Olark + phone: what do you use?
channel.description: Little bit of a nuts and bolts question. Does anybody use Olark on their marketing site and have it hooked up to their phone? Which XMPP app do you use on your phone? I've only found one that I would consider acceptable (IM+) and lately it doesn't notify me of messages unless it's open, which renders it useless. Wondering if anyone else has found a good solution to the whole Olark + phone thing.

item.title: Olark + phone: what do you use?
item.dc:creator: jasonswett
item.description:
Thanks. That worked for me.

Read full topic
